body.name: EVERLIT Home Medic Kit | All-Purpose First Aid Kit for Cuts, Scrapes, Sprains & Burns | Medical Supplies for Home, Office, Car, Travel, Camping, Outdoor | 380 Emergency Preparedness Essentials
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 15 hrs 4 mins
features: 🩹 Extensive 380-Piece Set: Our Home Medic Kit comes packed with 380 vital medical supplies, each carefully selected to cover a wide range of emergencies including cuts, scrapes, sprains, burns, and more.

💧 Wall-Mountable, Durable and Water-Resistant Bag: The Home Medic Kit comes in a water-resistant bag, protecting your medical supplies from moisture and ensuring they stay dry and ready for use. The robust construction guarantees longevity, even in rough conditions. For added convenience and accessibility, our kit is designed to be wall-mountable, making it a perfect fit for schools, workshops, and offices.

🔒Intuitively Organized, Never Lose Another Piece: Everything in our kit is meticulously organized. With a design that ensures nothing is loosely fitted, you no longer have to worry about misplaced or lost essentials. Everything stays securely in place.

🎒 Compact and Portable Design: Despite its extensive contents, our kit is compact enough to fit in small spaces. Easily store it in your home cabinet, office desk, or car. It's also perfect for outdoor activities like camping and hiking.

🌈🎨Color-Coded & Packaged All For Quick Access: Every item in our kit is not only categorized based on its function but also color-coded for immediate identification. Our unique color code system simplifies first aid, even for those with minimal medical knowledge. Each color corresponds to a specific type of aid, guiding you seamlessly through each step of the treatment process. For example, red might indicate items for wound treatment, while blue could be for burns, making it incredibly user-friendly.
body.description: Discover the Everlit Care Home Medic Kit, a meticulously designed first aid toolkit that redefines practicality and comprehensiveness for your family's safety. With 380 essential items to address a wide spectrum of emergencies, it's tailored to provide unparalleled peace of mind. The durable, water and dirt-resistant fabric ensures it stands the test of time. Our Home Medic Kit equips you with all essential tools and medical supplies to handle everything from minor injuries to extreme weather-related conditions like hypothermia, making it an essential component of your household safety plan.
